name: Phantom Nation
uniques: Earn 50 Gold when killing an enemy unit
startIntroPart1: Welcome, Trickster, leader of the Phantom Thieves! You stand as the beacon of rebellion in a corrupt world...
startIntroPart2: Will your cunning and charisma build a world of justice, or will the chains of power drag you down?
declaringWar: Justice cannot stand by while corruption runs free!
attacked: Your actions reveal your true nature. The Phantom Thieves will stop you.
defeated: It seems... our rebellion ends here. But the fight for justice will never stop.
introduction: I am Joker, leader of the Phantom Nation. Let’s hope you’re one of the good guys.
neutralHello: So, what’s your deal? Friend or foe?
hateHello: We’ve got our eye on you. Don’t try anything funny.
tradeRequest: Make it worth our while, and we’ll see.

name: Palace Universe
uniques: Can buy City-States allied for 5 turns
startIntroPart1: Welcome, corrupted ruler of the Palace Universe. Greed and fear are your tools to dominate the world...
startIntroPart2: Will you hoard wealth and power, or will the rebellion of the oppressed shatter your empire?
declaringWar: Fools. You dare to challenge my wealth and power?
attacked: Your insolence will not go unpunished.
defeated: Even in ruin, my legacy of greed will endure.
introduction: I am Kamoshida. Bow before the Palace Universe or prepare to be crushed.
neutralHello: Welcome. Let’s discuss terms—if you have something to offer.
hateHello: You’re a fool to think you can defy me.
tradeRequest: This deal better be worth my time.

name: Ryuji's Haven
uniques: Entire map revealed at game start
All nations and City-States start with -690 reputation
startIntroPart1: Yo, I’m Ryuji. Strong, loud, and always ready for a fight! My Haven thrives on action and doesn’t wait around for anyone...
startIntroPart2: Will you stand beside me or get run over by the storm?
declaringWar: Alright, let’s get this party started!
attacked: You’ve messed with the wrong Haven!
defeated: Damn it... Guess I wasn’t strong enough.
introduction: I’m Ryuji. Let’s hope you’re not here to waste my time.
neutralHello: What’s up? Got something to say?
hateHello: Tread carefully. I don’t trust you.
tradeRequest: Let’s get this done quickly. Time’s ticking.

name: Morgana's Empire
uniques: +33% Culture and Science when Happiness is positive
+20% Great Person Generation in the Capital
All cities receive a free Monument upon founding
startIntroPart1: Hey, I’m Morgana! Smart, charming, and way better at leading than anyone else! My empire is built on brains, not brawn...
startIntroPart2: Will you follow my lead to a brighter future, or will you stand in the way of progress?
declaringWar: Ugh, don’t make me fight you. You’ll regret it!
attacked: You’ve got a lot of nerve attacking me.
defeated: No way... This can’t be happening! I’ll come back stronger!
introduction: Greetings! I’m Morgana, the brilliant ruler of this empire. Shall we work together for progress?
neutralHello: Let’s hear what you have to say. Don’t waste my time.
hateHello: You’re skating on thin ice here.
tradeRequest: Alright, let’s make a deal—but it better be worth my while.
